name: Kerberoasting
xql_query:
preset = xdr_event_log
| alter TicketOptions = regextract(to_json_string(action_evtlog_data_fields)->TicketOptions{}, "\"(.*)\"")
| alter TicketEncryptionType = regextract(to_json_string(action_evtlog_data_fields)->TicketEncryptionType{}, "\"(.*)\"")
| alter ServiceName = regextract(to_json_string(action_evtlog_data_fields)->ServiceName{}, "\"(.*)\"")
| filter (action_evtlog_event_id = 4768 and TicketOptions = "0x40810000" and TicketEncryptionType = "0x17") and  not (ServiceName = "$*")
